General.Name: McDonald's Holdings Company (Japan) Ltd
General.Description: McDonald's Holdings Company (Japan), Ltd. operates a chain of hamburger restaurants under the McDonald's brand in Japan. The company was formerly known as Japan McDonald's K.K. and changed its name to McDonald's Holdings Company (Japan), Ltd. in July 2002. McDonald's Holdings Company (Japan), Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
